Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.9596699] Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli NCTC 8007 (MIC=18 μM), Escherichia coli NCTC 10418 (MIC=40 μM);Gram-negative bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=14 μM);Clinical isolates:Acinetobacter sp. (MIC=0.3 μM), Klebsiella sp. strain 3105 (MIC=80 μM), Providencia stuartii (MIC=110 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-negative bacteria and Gram-positive bacteria. HLP 7 is the d form of HLP 2.

Literature.Title: Structure-function relationship of antibacterial synthetic peptides homologous to a helical surface region on human lactoferrin against Escherichia coli serotype O111.
Literature.Author: Chapple DS, Mason DJ, Joannou CL, Odell EW, Gant V, Evans RW.
